hadiths.text: This hadith has been reported on the authority of Abu Bishr with the same the same chain of transmitters (with these words):That he recited Umm-ul-Qur'an (Sura Fatiha), and he collected his spittle and he applied that and the person became all right

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ أَخْذِ الأُجْرَةِ عَلَى الرُّقْيَةِ بِالْقُرْآنِ وَالأَذْكَارِ
chapter.eng-name: The Permissibility Of Accepting A Reward For Reciting Ruqyah With Qur'an And Supplications
